items.title: Eye tracking
items.text: Tobii Pro Glasses 3 wearable eye tracker with 16 illuminators and 4 eye cameras.

items.title: GPU computing
items.text: Multi‑GPU Supermicro workstation based on NVIDIA Tesla P100 with NVLink architecture.

items.title: Large Language Models
items.text: Access to state‑of‑the‑art LLMs for customization, fine‑tuning and evaluation.
